nodes.text: Ajen Smuckles was a Human female smuggler who lived during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Around the time of the Battle of Rishi, Smuckles sold gear to fellow smugglers in Raider's Cove, a port city on the remote planet Rishi.

Ajen Smuckles appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as the Level 60 Basic Gear vendor on Rishi for the Smuggler class. Smuckles and the rest of the class gear vendors at Rishi, along with all other Daily Areas and high-level planets, were replaced by a single standardized vendor in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015; she was replaced by Yu Dakar.
